title: shrI shUlinIm shrita
sahitya:
shrI shUlinIm shrita pAlinIm jIvEshvaraikya shAlinIm 
smara citta brahma kapAlinIm shiva cinmAlinIm bhava khElinIm


caraNam   pAshinIm sharabhEshvara hrdayAvEshinIm ajnAna dhvAnta vinAshinIm ravicandra 
tEja prakAshinIm vindhya nivAsinIm Isha guruguha vishvAsinIm IshvarIm bhakta 
manOllAsinIm shrIshanutE bhava bhaya dhvamsinIm simha vAhinIm jaganmOhinIm
